programme.title: Capturing water
programme.desc: In 2018, Cape Town narrowly averted completely running out of drinking water. The city council committed to take urgent action to protect water supplies by enforcing a policy of limited access. Capturing Water follows the fight to overturn water cuts-offs, which are punitive to the Capes many poor dwellings and exposes the lethal pitfalls of market-led solutions to the water crisis.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Akvaarionrakentajat Wayde ja Brett ja australialainen poptahti Alli Simpson lahjoittavat akvaarion yhdessa lastensairaalalle ja -verkostolle.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kaapiovuohi saapuu vastaanotolle paiseen takia. Kameroita vieroksuva suojelukoira tyollistaa elainlaakari Lavignea. Elainlaakari Blue pitaa sukupuolenpaljastamisjuhlat.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 9. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Nelja pelkaamattomien seikkailijoiden ryhmaa jattaa modernin elaman mukavuudet ja teknologiset loukut taakseen kokeillakseen elamaa Alaskan eramaassa.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Dorothyn ja Travisin kissa oksentaa vihasta ja hyokkailee heidan kimppuunsa. Nyt he pelkaavat poikansa puolesta. Jackon tarvitsee kaiken kokemuksensa taman kissan kasittelemiseen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Villalobosin vaki saa haadon Kaliforniasta ja muuttaa New Orleansiin.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Tia ottaa hoiviinsa hylatyn koiran, joka karsii sydanmatotaudista. Comanche loytaa vastoin odotuksia uuden kodin, mutta sen terveys uhkaa estaa adoption.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Pakoileva pitbullterrieri on pelastunut hukkumiselta ja tarvitsee nyt Tian apua. Kun keskukseen saapuu 20 uutta koiranpentua, joutuu Tia palkkaamaan uuden ehdonalaisen.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Nichols hoitaa naapurin koiran kanssa tappelussa loukkaantunutta kissaa. Neljasluokkalaisten kaikki toivo on Jeffissa, etta tama pystyisi pelastamaan lemmikkisiilin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kun vastaanotolle saapuu suustaan vaahtoava koira, taytyy elainlaakari Jeffin toimia nopeasti. Penelope-possu tarvitsee leikkauksen, jota Jeff ole koskaan aiemmin tehnyt.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Afrikanpingiviinien yhteiso toivottaa uusimmat jasenet tervetulleeksi parittelukauden jalkeen. Lisaksi uusi merisaukko laitetaan lajitoveriensa joukkoon.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 8 osa 1/11. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. (Pit Bulls and Parolees , tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Bengalinkissa hairitsee ystavysten Shannan ja Lorin rauhaa ja ilkea uroskissa aiheuttaa huolta tulevalle emolle. Pystyyko Jackson auttamaan kissaongelmissa?

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: UUSI KAUSI Pete Nelson tiimeineen rakentaa toinen toistaan uskomattomampia puumajoja ihmisille, jotka haluavat kosketuksiin luonnon kanssa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson kumppaneineen suunnittelee ja rakentaa yksityisia piilopirtteja puuhun ihmisille, jotka tahtovat kosketuksiin luonnon ja sisaisen lapsensa kanssa.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet pystyvat uskomattomiin tekoihin, joista me ihmiset voimme vain haaveilla. Tieteen uusimmat loydot ja hammastyttavat naytokset valottavat elainten valtakunnan salaisuuksia.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kevaan kiima-aika on alkanut, ja vuosittain taytyy syntya 15 pentua pandapopulaation sailymiseksi. Matkaamme myos Qinling-vuorille tarkkailemaan villipandoja.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Akvaarionrakentajat Wayde ja Brett ja australialainen poptahti Alli Simpson lahjoittavat akvaarion yhdessa lastensairaalalle ja -verkostolle.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Tiimi suuntaa Fairbanksin kaupungin ulkopuolelle syvalle Alaskan sisamaahan tutkimaan havaintoja Pohjoisen jattilaiseksi kutsutusta karhumaisesta otuksesta.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Henkilokunta yrittaa pelastaa pikku poikasen. Paksu pingviini joutuu tiukalle dieetille ja kotipesalla tunnistamattoman sukupuolen poikanen saa tarkeita testituloksia.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Amputoidun Cedricin onnellinen avioliitto Robinin kanssa joutuu koetukselle. Nuori Squeaker koettelee ihmisten hermoja. Vaarallisen haavan saanut villipingviini saapuu hoitoon.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Riistanvalvojat jarjestavat usean kunnan yooperaation pysayttaakseen autonvaloilla ja tiella metsastajat. Kuolleesta peurasta loytynyt nuoli vie valvojat salametsastajan jaljille.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Ross ostaa liikkuvan yksikon kauempana tehtavaa tyota varten. Klinikalla han tutkii iguanan paisetta, ja halvaantunut mayrakoira saa uudet pyorat alleen.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Puumajoja tilaustyona rakentava Django Kroner aloittaa uuden rakennuksen Kentuckyssa. Asiakas haluaa majan yli 20 metrin korkeuteen, joten Django lahtee ottamaan oppia sirkuksesta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin sademetsassa tiimi etsii lahes nakymatonta otusta, nimittain pantterikameleonttia. Matelija nayttaa kokeiden perusteella uhmaavan fysiikan lakeja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 4. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff tekee kaikkensa pelastaakseen auto-onnettomuuteen joutuneen koiran jalat. Uusi eksoottisten elainten laakari tohtori Baier hoitaa laihtuvaa Burman pythonia.

programme.desc: Sotajalalla. Jacksonin apua pyytavat pariskunta, joka ei pysty muuttamaan yhteen vihamielisten kissojensa vuoksi, ja sotaveteraani, jonka kissa suhtautuu vakivaltaisesti tyttoystavan koiraan.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson tiimeineen rakentaa toinen toistaan uskomattomampia puumajoja ihmisille, jotka haluavat kosketuksiin luonnon kanssa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson tiimeineen rakentaa toinen toistaan uskomattomampia puumajoja ihmisille, jotka haluavat kosketuksiin luonnon kanssa.

programme.desc: Villielainbiologi Forrest Gallante kiertaa maailmaa ja etsii uuden teknologian avulla lajeja, joita muu maailma ei enaa etsi.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Baseball- legenda Pete Rose haluaa muuttaa Riverfront Stadiumin akvaarioksi. Myohemmin Wayde ja Heather matkustavat Horry Countyyn rakentaakseen valtavan akvaarion.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikekumppanukset, parhaat ystavat ja toistensa kovimmat kilpailijat Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Nelja pelkaamattomien seikkailijoiden ryhmaa jattaa modernin elaman mukavuudet ja teknologiset loukut taakseen kokeillakseen elamaa Alaskan eramaassa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Murphy-koiranpentu syo palan koria, ja kun se poistetaan leikkauksella, loytyy vatsasta epanormaali verisuoni. Kirurgi Kathryn kauhistuu sen kokoa, pystyyko han parantamaan sen?

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymiseen keskittynyt terapeutti Jacqueline Wilson kay suur-Los Angelesin alueen pikkukoirien luona yrittamassa korjata niiden pahoja tapoja.

programme.title: Weird, True And Freaky: Real Monsters
programme.desc: Ohjelma listaa kymmenen verisinta hyokkaysta, joiden tekijoina on mm. massiivisia hirvioita, kiemurtelevia kaarmeita, veitsihampaisia kissoja ja merien salakavalia tappajia.

programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael embarks on a stunning rail journey from the Thar Desert in Rajasthan to the Indian capital, taking in desert landscapes and dazzling historic palaces. 4/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: See the long, dark, frozen winters to sweltering, bug-infested summers in remote Canada.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to New Zealands North Island, where he meets a young nomadic family led by Amber and Andy, who spend their life exploring the countrys wild landscapes.

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in France at an enormous croissant factory where they produce 336,000 of the flaky pastries every day. He follows the production of croissants from the arrival of 21 tonnes of butter right through to dispatch.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: A stunning discovery in the Mediterranean reveals a lost Roman city- and the untold story of an industrial capital made rich by supplying every corner of the empire. 4/6

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild
programme.desc: The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Jessie narrowly escapes disaster while establishing new trail. Ricko and his children restore a decades old woodshed, and the Hailstone family hunt flightless birds.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a former carpenter who now lives alone on a private island in the Icelandic wilderness. He discusses how a struggle with alcoholism drove him to turn his back on life in the big city, and enlists Bens aid in fishing and harvesting, as well as maintaining his yurt business. They also go swimming in the freezing waters and take a trek up the countrys most famous volcano - and discover how the island could be under threat from Icelands volatile environment.

programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko. 1/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.desc: Ben Fogle journeys to the mountains of central Portugal.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As summer nears its end in every corner of Alaska, residents of the Arctic adjust their needs and work accordingly. Sue Aikens heads to the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge to embark on a hunt for elusive prey. In Chitina, Jessie Holmes searches the Copper River to stockpile King Salmon. In Kiwalik, the Hailstone family splits up to tackle crucial tasks during the last days of the warm season.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to the Ozark National Forest in Arkansas, to live with craftsman Robert.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: In this episode about how to stay healthy on the inside, Michael meets an 86-year-old cyclist with the immune system of a 30-year-old. He also discovers the benefits of Tai Chi towards losing weight.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin joins an international team of palaeontologists in the remote badlands of Wyoming as they investigate a mysterious dinosaur graveyard. Packed with over a dozen skeletons, including predators such as the fearsome Allosaurus and iconic giants like Diplodocus, as well as fossilised plants and footprints, the site is a treasure trove that is helping to change the way we think about the Jurassic - the golden age of dinosaurs. The astonishing evidence also helps the team to answer why so many dinosaurs came here and what killed them in such great numbers 150 million years ago.

programme.title: Junamatka Eurooppaan
programme.desc: Kausi 6, 6/6. Kauden paatosjaksossa Michael Portillo tutustuu Uttar Pradesh -osavaltion paakaupunkiin Lucknowiin ja yrittaa selvittaa totuuden vuoden 1857 Lucknowin piirityksesta, mika enteili suoran brittihallinnon alkua Intiassa. Sitten Portillo matkustaa miljoonakaupunki Kalkuttaan, missa han muistelee intialaista Nobel-palkittua runoilijaa Rabindranath Tagorea. Portillo tarkastelee myos Intian rikasta tekstiiliteollisuutta ja sen modernisoitumista. Upeat kankaat ovat aina olleet tarkea osa Intian kulttuuria.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Bean’s bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm asks Manny to magic up an ice cream to help him cool down in the hot sun. But Squirm’s eyes are bigger than his belly…or are they??

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, although Daphnes more focused on nailing Fred with a revenge snowball. Their snowy fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, but the fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bizzy Buzzards mom hires The Looney Builders to build her family a new nest. Bizzy wants to help but keeps getting in the way creating all sorts of problems for the crew.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint the old library. / The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes to the beach to get a tan, but when the countryman arrives and prevents him from exposing to the sun, he is trying to find another place. And when the nimbus cloud covers the sun, he starts to desperately chase the beam of sunlight across London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon... which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. Starving, Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. Only the Lemmings are already using it for their latest rocket game in the piping system.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cave Cat arrives at Rick and Gingers House.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the three Little Pigs story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Maude tasks Tom with guarding her prize pumpkin until she enters it into competition at the county fair.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle for control erupts after a genie emerges from a lamp that Ginger brought home from a yard sale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse detectives are hired to track down Tuffys imaginary scapegoat, Mr. Nobody.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its the battle of the soldier angels when pranks run amok on April Fools Day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has trouble keeping track of a pinata full of stolen loot.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A knock on the head turns Tom into Quixote that leads him into battle with Butch over Toodles affections.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxation—and off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. / Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! / Bibi just can’t put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bam’s utility belt for a mission.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just can’t put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bam’s utility belt for a mission. / Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Gossamer extends a camping trip invitation to the Looney Builders; their plans for a basic campsite shift when Daffy convinces the group to experience glamping instead.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station. / The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzy’s stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings’ robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chip’s memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: there’s one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabin’s solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings’ strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that it’s his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In order to please Boss, the Docs plan to catch Lamput to surprise him on his birthday, but it looks like their colleagues have the same idea. A fierce race begins!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Beans birthday dinner is ruined when he gets a bad table and ends up sitting next to a confused movie star. After swimming in the lobster tank, Mr Bean unknowingly takes revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang enter Dickens classic ?A Christmas Carol?, as they try to get to the bottom of the mysterious ghost tormenting Scrooge in 1843 England. Unfortunately, the Ghosts begin to convince Velma shes on a disastrous path of her own.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Unhappy about a mystery-free, three-day, cross-country train trip with the gang, Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board. Hes less pleasantly surprised however, when that mystery is interrupted by a second mystery, then a third, then a fourth…

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the sore into sore loser by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its summer, and Spikes the primary beneficiary of Ricks daily grilling ritual: the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realizes its time to back off the beef.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cats Meow Dance Competition is coming up and Toodles dance partner has gone missing! In the meantime, Toodles needs a new dance partner in case hers doesnt turn up. Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor. But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now its up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the Ranger Lemming toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by flies buzzing incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs waterpark. He keeps adding onto the design with the support of Bugs until problems arise.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Its Tazs birthday, and the Looney Builders decide to build him a huge ice cream sundae. Porky, however, is paranoid about little mistakes causing delays which could result in the ice cream melting.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. / Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: An action-packed music video of the Batwheels most exciting adventures set to an extended version of the series theme song.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them. When Mush-Mush reply they should play together to see how fun it is, Fung and Miff accept. Mush-Mush surprisingly gets along with Fung and Miff... until one dare too many.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out. Worried, Mushpot explains to our friends that the Tree of Life, that regenerate the entire forest, is dying! There is only one Mushable who could help Mushpot to save the forest: Starmush. But the Mushelders haven’t gotten along for years. Will they be able to put their differences aside in order to save the Tree of Life before it’s too late?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is and that his daily life must be extraordinary. So, Mush-Mush trails Starmush, which soon annoys the Mushelder. To get rid of Mush-Mush, Starmush decides to live up to the Mushler’s fantasies…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. But the temptation is too much and Chep can’t resist taking the seedpod and opening it… to find it is full of itchy powder! Argh! Mush-Mush and Lilit do their best to help their friend, but it seems like the only way Chep can get rid of the itching is to ask Mushpot for a remedy…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings’ fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out it’s Grizzy’s birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzy’s peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings’ party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed by the thawing ice, a mysterious giant egg slides up to the front door of the log cabin. The Lemmings watch the hatching of a large baby dinosaur that immediately mistakes them for his mummies. Grizzy cannot tolerate a new intruder like this in the cabin, but how does he earn the respect of a gang of Lemmings who are armed with a T-Rex, even it is only a baby?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. But Bolly is different – he just likes to use his speed helping Mushables. So when Mush-Mush organizes a big stunt for Bolly, he refuses. He just doesn’t like to show off. But Mush-Mush promised everyone a show so a show he will give them – with Mush-Mush performing instead of Bolly! Gulp!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore -- all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Chep’s disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning.
