But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent. But Lilit’s art lessons conflict with the fun project she has been working on with Mush-Mush and Chep. And when she sees that her friends are having a great time without her, Lilit is seriously annoyed which her paintings start showing…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: It’s Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesn’t seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the Mouse Sisters to build a bridge over a mac and cheese spill. / The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxation—and off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom does his best to be a dutiful butler in a mansion house. Jerry hinders him at every turn, with the intent of creating as much mess as possible.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Meathead turns into a genius when he gulps down a bottle of specially formulated water.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Duke returns from India with some wild animals that escape their cages and begin to terrorize the manor. Tom is tasked with putting everything back in order.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A stranger with a divining rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when the dog next door shows up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer, Morgan.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On vacation in the west with Rick and Ginger Tom and Jerry encounter the legendary Jackalope!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detective are hired to find a missing rare diamond.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farmhands.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvesters back. They build Zippy a flea circus to try and convince him to relocate and relieve Sylvesters itch.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build an outdoor movie theater in the park. / The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvester’s back.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when it’s being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings’ fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out it’s Grizzy’s birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzy’s peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings’ party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Just like every year for Halloween Fred refuses to leave the house. He believes that no mysteries will be solved on that day and that nothing will go as planned.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: On a trip to Japan to visit Velmas friend, the gang comes face to face with the ancient crab monster, Kaniaku, and attempts to solve a 700 year-old mystery. Meanwhile, Daphne accidentally becomes a viral media sensation in Japan!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick’s required not to eat or drink for 12 hours.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany -- hes losing his hair! Paranoid hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom’s hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case he’s sent to recover at the local animal hospital.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerry’s home, his home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. When his crane breaks down, his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build them a home underground. Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname Tough Buff. But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels face off with the Legion of Zoom as they attempt to recover Batmans stolen cowl from the villainous vehicles.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone. But Amanita keeps ruining Mush-Mush’s performance by figuring out all his tricks. Grrr! When Mush-Mush decides to do his famous ‘Disappearing Mushable’ trick on Truff, Truff really disappears! And now, Amanita and Mush-Mush must join forces to find their disappearing friend.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is very proud he invented a new game called Fruity Bounce, where he and his friends bounce as high as possible on the bouncier fruits they can find.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp. Morel is relieved. But when Mush-Mush and his friends later come back, panicked, and reveal that the Mushlets have disappeared, Morel has no choice but to face his fear and join our friends on their rescue mission in the dark!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy undergoes an identity crisis after a run-in with a metal pan. Can the Lemmings help him get back to normal?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied break dance the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky threads are perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy rapidly discovers that the true interference is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river, he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy, and before the Lemmings do, he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Inside...
programme.desc: The Center for Islamic Civilization in Tashkent stands at the intersection of culture, history, and faith. Its a place where Uzbekistans rich intellectual and artistic heritage meets the possibilities of the future. Through conversations with scholars, curators, and craftspeople, we see how an idea conceived nearly a decade ago has grown into a national center dedicated to rediscovering the spirit of the Islamic Golden Age. Inside its walls, ancient manuscripts are being preserved and digitized, thousands of artifacts have been returned home, and new technologies bring history vividly to life. Beyond the Center, in the workshops of the Abul Kasim Madrasah, master artisans, woodcarvers, miniature painters, and ceramicists continue traditions that have shaped the region for centuries. Together, these voices reveal a living continuation of creativity and knowledge, showing how the legacy of Islamic civilization is not only remembered, but renewed in the heart of modern Uzbekistan.

programme.title: Global Perspectives

programme.title: Call to Earth
programme.desc: Dr. Gladys Kalema-Zikusoka has dedicated her life to protecting Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, building a conservation model that allows both humans and wildlife to thrive.

programme.title: Call to Earth
programme.desc: World-renowned wildlife photographer Chris Fallows leads an inspiring journey from South Africa to Tanzania, highlighting the threats facing some of Africas most wild places and celebrating those racing to save them.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: In southwestern Zimbabwe, art has been a language for millennia. Scattered across the towering hills are cave paintings dating back over 13,000 years. Today, in the rural villages of the Matobos, another vibrant tradition thrives; house painting. A seasonal tradition has now become an annual competition rewarding the winners of My Beautiful Home, which has not only helped preserve an ancestral tradition and improve local womens livelihoods, but has now inspired spin-outs in the world of modern art, interior design, and fashion.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: With little arable land and scarce mineral resources but beautiful beaches and waters, tourism is integral to Cape Verdes economy. While country leaders are hoping this growth will turbocharge a prosperous new chapter for the country, industry leaders are looking at ways to create infrastructure, both on the ground and online, that can ensure a sustainable industry as well. Also: since the late 1970s, Animal Care Services Konsult has been in the business of livestock. Zain Asher sits down with the companys Executive Director, Opeyemi Agbato, to talk about the companys diversification strategy and how the companys grown with the country over the last four-plus decades.

programme.title: Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: Web Summit has become the must-attend conference in Europe for the tech world. For founders, investors, policymakers and startups, it provides a front-row seat for the tech debates that will shape our future. Europe continues to lag behind when it comes to unicorns - while the U.S. has around 800 startups valued at over $1billion, Europe has just over 200 - but that number has been growing with the AI boom, so we sat down with some of those leading lights in the continents tech scene.

programme.title: Eco India The Environment Magazine
programme.desc: How teaching girls sustainable agriculture at school will drive equality, and Dalit women fight caste discrimination, plus female shepherd training in Italy.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Brazil
programme.desc: Heikossa kunnossa olevat kilpailijat saavuttavat haasteen viimeisen osuuden. Matka maaliin on pitka ja taynna vaikeuksia.

programme.title: Loytoretki tuntemattomaan
programme.desc: Josh etsii kolmelle mantereelle ulottuvalla matkalla Pyhan Nikolauksen oikeaa elamantarinaa. Pyhimys tuli sittemmin tunnetuksi joulupukkina.

programme.title: Lost Monster Files
programme.desc: Tunnistamaton peto saalistaa miekkavalaita Alaskassa Kodiakin jaisella rannikolla. Ehtiiko tyoryhma tunnistaa pedon ennen kuin se iskee uudestaan?

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Daven uusin asiakas pyytaa hanta rakentamaan CF1:n kaikilla 60-luvun brittilaisen vintage-kilpa-auton hienouksilla.

programme.title: Alastomat selviytyjat
programme.desc: Kolme entista fania yrittaa parjata 21 paivaa Belizen viidakossa. Kun yksi joutuu lahtemaan hatatilanteen takia, tilalle saapuu uusi selviytyja.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Shawn siirtyy Vernonin kohteeseen numero 56, ja kaksi kaivajaa tavoittelee samaa kultasuonta. Kris Kelly joutuu elaman ja kuoleman tilanteeseen.

programme.title: Kultakuume: White Water
programme.desc: UUSI KAUSI! Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa on kultaa, joka odottaa ottajaansa - mutta sita on tarjolla vain niille, jotka ovat valmiita vaaralliseen ja likaiseen tyohon. Dakota Fred ja Dustin Hurt kokeilevat entista vaarallisempia, mutta potentiaalisesti myos entista tuottoisampia kullankaivuun keinoja. (Gold Rush - Kultakuume: White Water)

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Ant loytaa 1977-vm MG Midget 1500:n, joka on kuin hanen ensimmainen teinina kunnostamansa auto. Tiukan budjetin ja ruosteen takia perhe tulee apuun.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Daven tekemien Corvettejen ihailija haluaa rakentaa oman kokoelmansa. Tyoryhma alkaa innolla tyostaa 1958-vuosimallia tarkasti sentti sentilta.

programme.title: Laakarihelikopteri Cornwall
programme.desc: Poika kuljetetaan rannalta helikopteriambulanssilla. Moottoripyorailijalla on hengitysvaikeuksia. Sydankohtauspotilaan luokse on vaikea laskeutua.

programme.title: Contraband: Seized At Sea
programme.desc: Lautalta saapuvia ajoneuvoja tarkastavat virkailijat tekevat loydon. T-paitalasti saattaa olla vaarennettya tavaraa.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike Brewer ja Michelle-vaimo aloittavat uuden hankkeen lahempana kotoa. He antavat katsojien kurkistaa toimintaan Warwickin uudella liikkeella.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Velkoihin hukkumaisillaan oleva Jared yrittaa pitaa yrityksensa pystyssa ja tyontekijat palkkalistoilla, kun vilunkipeli uhkaa kaataa leirin.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jaredin taytyy siirtaa miljoonan arvoinen puulasti myytavaksi pitkin jokea, mutta ei loydy ketaan tarpeeksi rohkeaa, joka johtaisi kuljetusta.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace innostuu kun pojat rakentavat jattiversion hanen lempilautapelistaan muuttamalla koko kaupungin Voropoli-pelilaudaksi. Silla valin Vanessa on telttaretkella ystaviensa kanssa ja tohtori Tollontyo pyytaa Perryn apua tyttarensa suojelemiseksi. / Kun Baljeet kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille sukunsa epaonnisesta polkupyorakilpailuhistoriasta, pojat rakentavat oman pyoraratansa, jotta han saisi voittaa. Silla valin Candace aikoo hankkia todisteita poikien puuhista uuden videokameransa avulla, mutta Tollontyon Ponnahdusnaattorin mainokset uhkaavat pilata hanen suunnitelmansa.

Silla aikaa kun isa kilpailee Adrian-veljeaan vastaan toinen toistaan hupsummissa asioissa, Ferb ja Finias todistavat jalkapallotaitonsa serkuilleen rakentamalla stadionin tarunhohtoista Jalkis X-Seiska-pelia varten. Kun Jeremy kehuu Eliza-serkun brittilaista puhetyylia, Candace paattaa oppia Elizalta, miten hienostuneet leidit kayttaytyvat.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Pojat ovat ylpeita Perrysta, kun siita tehdaan Tyokalutuvan mainoskampanjan keulahahmo. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo uhkaa kaupunkia Viiksinaattorillaan ja Candace osallistuu seminaariin paastakseen eroon karayttamispakkomielteestaan, mutta lahtee loppujen lopuksi veljiensa peraan entista paattavaisempana. / Kun pojat heittavat tikkaa jattitikalla, aiti puuhastelee nykytaideprojektin kanssa – mutta Candace erehtyy luulemaan aidin jateveistosta poikien uusimmaksi keksinnoksi. Silla valin isa osallistuu vahingossa pahojen tiedemiesten jarjeston johtajakilpaan.

programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Varvimuusika

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Tippkokk Angelica Udekull jatkab imelise jõulusoogi valmistamist. Sel korral tulevad appi Metsatoll, psuhholoog Tiina Saar-Veelmaa, kes annab nõu, kuidas jõulud sõbralikus meeleolus mooda saata ja rappar Genka, kes mõtleb kohapeal valja moodsad jõululuuletused. Hõrgutavad maitsed toovad ekraanile saatejuht Angelica Udekull, režissoor Marek Miil, toimetaja Robert Kõrvits, produtsent Laura Kõrvits.

programme.title: Georg
programme.desc: Tõsielufaktidel põhinev lugu eesti nimekaima ja armastatuima laulja Georg Otsa (1920-1975) saatusest, tema kunstniku- ning eraelust. Erakordse andega laulja jai maailma ooperilavadel tundmatuks. Peale Eesti tundis ja armastas teda vaid Venemaa ning Soome publik. Aeg oli selline. Nõukogude susteem oli oma talentide suhtes kiivas. Film jutustab laulja loo, kõneleb tema saatusest, mida vormisid keerulised ja muutlikud aastad.

programme.title: Eternally. The Songs Of Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: Charlie Chaplinit tuntakse kui suureparast filminaitlejat ja režissoori. Vahem teatakse aga seda, et ta komponeeris suurele osale oma filmidest ise muusika. Peale selle mangis ta paljusid instrumente, viiulit, tšellot, klaverit, juhatas salvestustel tihti orkestrit ja sailinud on mõned salvestused, kus ta ise ka laulab. Kõige tuntum on ehk Chaplini lugu “Smile”, mis filmis “Modern Time” 1936 oli hoopis instrumentaalpala ja sai teksti aastaid hiljem. Sellest laulust tuligi mõte uurida, kas on veel laule, mida Chaplin on kirjutanud ja kas nendest oleks võimalik teha kontsert. Selgus, et materjali on palju ja nii saigi projekt alguse. Kontserdi kavva jõudis 15 laulu, mis said Swing’n’Joy Orchestra’le sobivad seaded. Lisavarvi annab orkestri Saku Mandoliinid vaike koosseis. Solistide valikul sai otsustavaks Marko Matvere hea naitleja ja laulja kooslus ning klassikalikku filmimuusika varvi lisab muusikaliartist Kelli Uustani. Tantsib Kristin Pukka ja kõike seda ilmestab liivakunstnik Madli Luuk. Kontsert on ules ehitatud tummfilmi formaadis ja lugude pealkirjad kuvatakse ekraanil vaheldumisi liivajoonistustega. Repertuaarist veel niipalju, et kõik laulud on komponeeritud Chaplini enda poolt filmide jaoks, kuid mõned neist jaid ajapuudusel või mõnel muul põhjusel filmidest valja. See ei vahenda aga nende kvaliteeti. Chaplini laule on esitanud vaga palju kuulsaid artiste, naiteks Nat King Cole, Frank Sinatra, Engelbert Humperting, Judy Garland, Petula Clark jpt.

programme.title: Lumilaane lood
programme.desc: Äaremaast on maalitud vaga erinevaid pilte, kuid laupaevahommikused pildid tulevad vaga rõõmsavarvilised! Valismaalt Eestisse naasnud noorpaar on kodustanud uhe põikpaise Valgamaa talukoha ja puhunud sellele sisse kireva elu. Pisikeste põnnidega metsaelust rõõmu tundev pere kaasab lapsi kõikidesse oma tegemistesse ja igav nende seltsis juba ei hakka.

programme.title: Minu ETV
programme.desc: Endised ja praegused telestaarid meenutavad hetki oma karjaarist ning raagivad, mida Eesti Televisioon neile tahendab. Toimetajad Karmel Killandi ja Kai Vaartnõu, režissoor Ülle Õun. Tana on Meelis Kompusel 45. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Paukuva pakase kiuste laheme uhel aasta kulmemal paeval Kõrvemaale uisutama. Matkajuht Sven Luks õpetab matkauisutamise põhitõdesid ja viib jaisele teele labi kauni talvise looduse.

programme.title: Ühe pere muusika
programme.desc: Haide Mannamaed ja Toomas Trossi tunneme eelkõige klounide Piibu ning Tuuduna. Ent nende endi ja kogu pere tegemised on ikka seotud teatri ning muusikaga. Saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marika Kaasik, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Sel suvel moodus 100 aastat Tori hobuse tõuks nimetamisest ja nuud tahetakse kanda tema aretuskultuur ka UNESCO nimistusse. Uurime, mille poolest on Tori hobune nii eriline ja kuidas on õnnestunud tõugu tanaseni sailitada. Laane-Eesti saari peetakse sõraliste paradiisiks. Laheme Hiiumaale, kus uurime, milline on sealsete ulukite kaekaik ja kuidas kaib andmete kogumine metsaloomade kohta. Kaido Haagen teeb meid tuttavaks teenimatult kardetud kaaniga. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Elusade
programme.desc: Anari jattis linnaelu seljataha ja kolis maale elama, et rajada sinna oma unistuste kodu. Tana elab ta koos lastega talus, on hinnatud kulajuuksur ja õpetab lapsi pisikeses Unipiha algkoolis. Ometi on sellel idullil ka oma hind... Autor ja režissoor Kaidor Kahar, operaator Madis Reimund, helirežissoor Rein Fuks, montaažirežissoor Madli Laane-Metsalu.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Iiris hakkab kohviku juhtimist Britale ule andma. Siim tahaks Tiigilt raha laenata. Ints ja Anu avastavad konstaabel Torimi Uuevariku laudast. Alma ja Jane tutvuvad erukapten Leonhardiga, kes tahaks Mornasse elama tulla.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Detsembrikuumus
programme.desc: 9. november 1924. Naib, et kommunismitont enam Eesti Vabariiki ei ohusta. Noor abielupaar Tanel ja Anna uritavad toime tulla Eesti sõjavaelase ning sidekeskuse tootaja kasina sissetulekuga, kuid otsustavad siiski sõita Pariisi paremat elu otsima.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: Leidub muusikat ja lavarolle, mis võivad muuta elu. Millised need on ja mismoodi neid ara tunda? Plekktrummi jõulusaate kulaline on tanavusel Arvo Pardi sunnipaeva-aasta kontserturneel USA-s Carnegie Hallis debuteerinud ja hea vastuvõtu osaliseks saanud laulja Maria Listra. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Katriin Lepik, režissoor Maire Radsin, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Outrageous
programme.desc: Unity paaseb Hitleri lahiringi ja tutvustab Hitlerile ka Dianat. Diana korraldab Mosleyle kohtumise Hitleriga. Unity avaldab Saksa ajalehes poolehoidu juudikusimuse kasitlusele. Mitfordide noorimad õed astuvad seltskonda. Deborah tutvub noore aatomifuusikuga. Nancy satiiriline romaan, mis on palju pahandust põhjustanud, ilmub trukist. Peteril õnnestub tookoht leida.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Inspektor Ruth Calder on jaanud Shetlandile elama ja tema uus juhtum puudutab Toshi sõbrannat Anniet, kes uhel paeval koos pojaga kaob. Omaaegse imelapse Annie Londoni-aastatest pole suurt midagi teada ja peagi avastab Calder tema veidrad seosed eriteenistustega.

programme.title: Kingdoms of the Sun - The Poles
programme.desc: Maa telg on 23,5 kraadi kaldu ja seetõttu ei jaotu paikese soojus planeedil uhtlaselt. Nii kujunevad valja viis peamist kliimavoondit: kuumemad alad paiknevad paikesele kõige lahemal, poolused aga kõige kaugemal. Just polaaraladel on aastaaegade vaheldumine kõige ekstreemsem ja elutingimused kõige karmimad, ometi on need koduks mitmetele ainulaadsetele taime- ja loomaliikidele. Hirmuaratavatest jaakarudest kuni aktiivsete lemmingiteni – polaarne elustik on kohanenud karmides tingimustes ellu jaama. Lisaks on polaaraladel ulioluline roll kogu maailma elutingimuste seisukohast. Paikese kuningriigil on palju eri ilmeid!

programme.title: Osoon Timo Paloga Groonimaal
programme.desc: Seikleme koos polaarranduri Timo Paloga Groonimaal, et avastada selle jaise paiga loodust, kultuuri ja kohalikku elu. Võtame ette matka miljoneid aastaid vana jaakilbi serval, et naha oma silmaga, kuidas kliimamuutused seda paika mõjutavad. Uurime, mida arvatakse seal maailma kasvavast huvist Groonimaa rikkalike maavarade vastu ja kuidas on kohalikud selles karmis kliimas juba aastatuhandeid hakkama saanud. Saate autor on Kristo Elias, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste ja produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Arvo Pardi sunnipaev New Yorgis
programme.desc: Arvo Pardi sunnipaevapidustuste kõrgpunkt toimus New Yorgis, kus eestlased ullatasid publikut kõrgetasemelise muusika ja tunnustatud kultuuritegijatega. Kahel õhtul taitus maailma kõige kuulsam kontserdisaal Carnegie Hall pilgeni ja sellest kirjutasid kõik USA suured ajalehed. Kaisime presidendi ja kultuuridelegatsiooniga pidustustel kaasas ning rõõmustasime ka New Yorgi kohalike eestlastega. Režissoor Maarja Parsim, produtsendid Karmel Killandi ja Ruth Alakula.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Taas on vaja valja selgitada Eesti mangu hooaja võitja. Sel korral kohtuvad finaalsaates hitimeister Sven Lõhmus, Vanemuise naitleja Veiko Porkanen ja tuubamangija Toomas Oskar Kahur. Saadet juhib alati heatujuline Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Eesti Laul
programme.desc: Eesti Laul 2026. Kuulamine toob vaatajate ette võistluse tanavused finalistid. Sel korral annavad oma hinnangu kuuele finaali jõudnud laulule muusikaeksperdid Maris Kõrvits, Andrei Zevakin ja Ott Lepland. Saadet juhib Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Meie hõimlased
programme.desc: Meie hõimlaste uus rannak viib saatejuht Kaidor Kahari ning soomeugri eksperdi Jaak Prozese taas Skandinaaviasse ja lõunanaabrite juurde, kus elab meie hõimukaaslasi, kelle kaekaigust me palju ei tea. Avasaates võetakse ette teekond karjalaste juurde, kus peitub ullatavalt palju paralleele eestlaste ja Eesti ajalooga. Saatejuhid Kaidor Kahar ja Jaak Prozes, produtsent Kristjan Ojang.

programme.title: Jõulutunnel 2025
programme.desc: ETV heategevussaade tegi neil puhadel koostood TÜ Kliinikumi lastefondiga, et vaatajate toel jõuaksid Eesti lasteni nuudisaegsed ravivõimalused, teeme kokkuvõtte uhisest heateost. Televaatajad saavad helistada fondi annetustelefonide numbritel: 9005025 (5 eurot); 9005100 (10 eurot); 9005500 (50 eurot). Lugusid ja muusikat vahendavad saatejuhid Margit Kilumets ja Margus Saar, režissoor on Rait Roland Veskemaa, kunstnik Ele Krusell ja produtsent Margus Saar.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Outrageous
programme.desc: Nancy ja Peteri abielu paistab laabuvat, sest Peter on oma uude ametisse sisse elanud. Nancy on Maryle sõpruse parast vaga tanulik, kuid peab pettuma. Diana ei taha parast autoavariid Nancyt nahagi ja põgeneb haiglast Itaaliasse Mosley juurde. Unity kavatseb pariselt Saksamaale elama minna. Nancy meelitab Jessicat Londonisse meelt lahutama.

programme.title: The Last Showgirl
programme.desc: Pamela Andersoni uut filmikarjaari pooret tahistav roll vananeva Las Vegase showtantsija Shellyna, kellele on igaõhtused esinemised, satendavad kostuumid ja trupikaaslastest asenduspere 30 aasta valtel olnud elu peamiseks sisuks. Kui uued omanikud otsustavad show kavast maha võtta, kukub Shelly maailm kokku. Uute toootsingute taustal puuab ta soojendada suhteid oma taiskasvanud tutre Hannah’ga, kelle ta kunagi too tõttu hulgas. Coppolate kinodunastia kolmanda põlve autori Gia Coppola draama on kaunis luigelaul kadunud ajastule ning sellega koos rambivalgusest valja heidetud inimhingedele. R: Gia Coppola. O: Pamela Anderson, Brenda Song, Dave Bautista, Jamie Lee Curtis, Jason Schwartzman jt.

programme.title: Nipernaadi
programme.desc: Toomas Nipernaadi teekond umber suvise Eesti, talude ja perenaiste jargib kirjandusklassika ekraniseerimise kaanoneid. Rõõmus seikleja, kelle jaoks peaaegu kõik on võimalik, mangib naistega, tehes neid sellest hoolimata õnnelikumaks. Rolle vahetades muutub ta vahel ka endale koormaks ja on sunnitud jalle teele asuma. Reþissoor Kaljo Kiisk valis Gailiti romaanist kõige iseloomulikumad lõigud ja sidus need peategelase mõõdule vastavaks tervikuks. Varjamatult poeetiline ja maaliliselt lavastatud Nipernaadi seob unistusi ning irooniat. Osades Tõnu Kark, Viire Valdma, Katrin Kohv, Aire Johanson, Rita Raave, Margus Oopkaup jt. Film taastati ja restaureeriti projekti Eesti film 100 raames.

programme.title: Von Fock
programme.desc: Kui Paul von Fock, noorim kolmest vennast, parib Sagadi mõisa, seisab ta silmitsi raskustega oma uues rollis sotsiaalselt kohanemisel. Kuid tema erakordne võime majandada oma valdusi ja terav õiglustunne kindlustavad talle kiiresti kohaliku kohtu assessori ametikoha. Oodates, et ta tegeleb vaid kõrtsikakluste ja piirivaidlustega, ei ole ta sugugi valmis selleks, mis teda ees ootab – mõrvamusteeriumid, võltsitud identiteedid, maalid ja raha, varastatud varandused ning tulevikud. 1. osa. Paul von Fock ei ole sugugi vaimustuses kui tema lapsepõlvesõbranna Maria von Nottbeck, nuudseks kurikuulus femme fatale, astub ballil Pauli lapsepõlvekiusaja Justus von Breverni vastu valja. Kui Justuse surnukeha leitakse jargmisel hommikul Pauli tellisetehasest, langeb kahtlus loomulikult koheselt Paulile. Kuid kohaliku kohtu assessorina on see ka tema kohustuseks antud kuritegu lahendada. Osades Priit Pius, Aurora Ruffino, Sten Karpov. Režissoor Arun Tamm.

programme.title: Von Fock
programme.desc: Kahtlusaluste nimekirjas on nii naabrid kui ka Paul ja Maria, kes ballil Breverni markmiku pihta panid. Samal ajal kui Breverni tõld on jarvest kadunud, peaaegu uputades Pauli, leitakse tema hobused ja tuleraud Sagadi maadelt. Kui Pauli taas tema teekonnal runnatakse, tuleb ilmsiks, et keegi tahab teda tappa või suudi lavastada. Seega peab ta ise hakkama juhtumi lahendamiseks reegleid rikkuma.

programme.title: Ridley
programme.desc: Briti krimisari endisest mõrvaruhma vanemuurijast Alex Ridleyst (Adrian Dunbar), kes oli sunnitud parast oma perekonna hukkumist narvivapustuse tõttu ameti maha panema. Kui aga tema kunagine kolleeg, uurija Carol Farman (Bronagh Waugh), kadunuks kuulutatud talumehe otsimisega janni jaab, võtab Ridley vastu politsei pakkumise naasta oma liistude juurde ja hakata ametlikult mõrvaruhma konsultandiks.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Lumilaane lood
programme.desc: Lumises Laane talus peetakse talgutoid tehes pereisa sunnipaeva, kaiakse ekskursioonil taluloomaaias ja võetakse meestega saunas maailma asjad pulkadeks lahti. Režissoor Margus Talvik, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Kingdoms of the Sun - The Poles
programme.desc: Maa telg on 23,5 kraadi kaldu ja seetõttu ei jaotu paikese soojus planeedil uhtlaselt. Nii kujunevad valja viis peamist kliimavoondit: kuumemad alad paiknevad paikesele kõige lahemal, poolused aga kõige kaugemal. Just polaaraladel on aastaaegade vaheldumine kõige ekstreemsem ja elutingimused kõige karmimad, ometi on need koduks mitmetele ainulaadsetele taime- ja loomaliikidele. Hirmuaratavatest jaakarudest kuni aktiivsete lemmingiteni – polaarne elustik on kohanenud karmides tingimustes ellu jaama. Lisaks on polaaraladel ulioluline roll kogu maailma elutingimuste seisukohast. Paikese kuningriigil on palju eri ilmeid!

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Kui veel kumme aastat tagasi olid hõbehaigrud Eestis pigem juhukulalised, siis nuud on nende valimuselt eksootiliste lindude pesitsuskohad juba mitmel pool ule Eesti. Kaime ornitoloog Renno Nellisega valitoodel uurimas, kui palju meie looduses siis hõbehaigruid on ja kuidas kohalik loodus nende tulekuga kohaneb. Autor Kristo Elias.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Poorame muusikute Mick ja Angeelia Pedaja ning tantsija-koreograaf Paasu-Liis Kensiga pilgu endasse ja kulgeme labi talvise pooripaeva Sõrvemaa looduses, otsides pimedusest insipratsiooni.

programme.title: Metsast maratonile. Puusuusa sund
programme.desc: Tanavu toimus 50. Tartu suusamaraton. Et minna juurte juurde tagasi, otsustas parimusmuusik Silver Sepp selle tarbeks teha endale puusuusad. Ja seda taitsa esivanemate kombekohaselt. Jalgisime Silverit ja teda abistanud kasitoomeistreid sest ajast, kui nad 2023. aasta aprillis metsa suusaks sobilikku puud valima laksid kuni hetkeni, mil muusik juubelimaratoni finišisse jõudis.

programme.title: Jõulutunnel 2025
programme.desc: ETV heategevussaade tegi neil puhadel koostood TÜ Kliinikumi lastefondiga, et vaatajate toel jõuaksid Eesti lasteni nuudisaegsed ravivõimalused, teeme kokkuvõtte uhisest heateost. Televaatajad saavad helistada fondi annetustelefonide numbritel: 9005025 (5 eurot); 9005100 (10 eurot); 9005500 (50 eurot). Lugusid ja muusikat vahendavad saatejuhid Margit Kilumets ja Margus Saar, režissoor on Rait Roland Veskemaa, kunstnik Ele Krusell ja produtsent Margus Saar.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Eesti Televisioon
programme.desc: Neil paevil 90 aastat tagasi ehitas Albrecht Ansip valmis vanima sailinud kaugnagemisvastuvõtuaparaadi Eestis. Aastavahetuseks 70 aastat tagasi oli Tallinna telestuudio juba 150 paeva edastanud eestikeelseid saateid 3900 televiisori omanikele. 6-osalises sarjas viib telelegend Vahur Kersna vaatajad rannakule Eesti Televisiooni ajaloo helesinise silmapiiri taha kulgevatele kuldsetele radadele. Kes tegi, mida tegi, kuidas tegi ja miks tegi? Alustame algusest. Režissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: Vana daami visiit
programme.desc: Miljardarist vanaproua teeb pikkade aastate jarel visiidi oma kunagisse kodulinna. Linn on laostunud ja alla kainud. Vana daam otsustab appi tulla ja pakub linnale uhe miljardi! Vastutasuks nõuab daam õiglust - tapsemalt õigluse taastamist linnas. Veel nõuab ta selle inimese surma, kes kauges nooruses keeldus tunnistamast ennast tema lapse isaks ja kelle valetunnistuse tõttu pidi daam linnast lahkuma. Kõigi hammelduseks osutub selleks meheks linna aukodanik Alfred Ill. Vana daam seab ennast võõrastemajas sisse ja jaab ootama... Peaosades Ita Ever ja Aarne Ükskula. Stsenaristid Ilmar Raag ja Roman Baskin, režissoor Roman Baskin.

programme.title: Reklaamiklubi naeratus
programme.desc: Lisaks tuhandetele reklaamfilmidele tootis Eesti Reklaamfilm omal ajal ka lõviosa ETV meelelahutuslikust poolest – Horoskoop, Vaata kooki, Jupiter, Ringliiklus, erineva nimega viktoriinid. Selle nimekirja kroonijuveel, Mati Eliste poolt 17 aastat juhitud Reklaamiklubi on tanaseni uks populaarsemaid Eesti telesaateid labi aegade. Vahur Kersna viib vaataja teekonnale Peedu Ojamaa loodud impeeriumi uskumatu tahelennu esimestest paevadest nukra haabumiseni. Režissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: Ridley
programme.desc: Politsei vajab taas Ridley abi, kui soomaale kaevatud madalast hauast leitakse noore naise surnukeha. Olgugi et politseil õnnestub naise isik tuvastada, ahvardab lugu juhtlõngade puudumise tõttu ummikusse joosta. Ent kogenud Ridley ei anna alla ja tõestab, et mitte miski polnud nii, nagu alguses tundus.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Koolis tapetakse otse videokoosoleku ajal kooli direktor, kuid enamik kahtlusaluseid olid mõrva ajal otse kaameras. Jalgi ajades jõuavad uurijad uhe vana looni, mille juured peituvad samuti koolis.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Kuidas sai uhest vanast ja vaarikast tuuleveskist sepikoda ning millist tood sepad Lauri ja Harri seal tapselt teevad? Reporter-toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoor Mikk Mae.

programme.title: Meie õpetajad
programme.desc: Saatesarja viimases osas kohtume Tiina Jaaksoniga – tippajakirjanikuga, kes parast peaaegu 30 aastat Aktuaalses kaameras tegi ootamatu kannapoorde. Nuud õpetab Tiina eesti keelt lastele, kellele see ei ole emakeel, aidates neil leida julgust igapaevases suhtluses ja avastada Eesti kultuuri. Tema lugu raagib julgusest astuda uude rolli ja leida selles oma koht. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

Laval astuvad ules Karl-Erik Taukar, Maarja-Liis Ilus koos Rauno Pehkaga, ansambel Regatt. Õhtut juhib Tõnis Niinemets.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: On jõulud 1968. Kui kõigi silmad on taevas, et jalgida astronautide katseid jõuda Kuule, on õde Monica Joan kindel, et tema silmad seda ei nae. Kuid vaike Colette on otsustanud valmistada talle ullatuse, mis nunnale eluisu tagasi tooks.
